title: Eyes On The Prize
lyrics:
Paul and Silas bound in jail
Had no money to go their bail
Keep your eyes on the prize, hold on
Hold on, hold on
Keep your eyes on the prize and hold on

Paul and Silas began to shout

Doors popped open and they walked out

Keep your eyes on the prize and hold on

Hold on, hold on

Keep your eyes on the prize and hold on



Only chains that we can stand

Are the chains of hand and hand

Keep your eyes on the prize and hold on

Got my hand on freedom's plow

Won't do nothing for it now

Keep your eyes on the prize, hold on

Hold on, hold on

Keep your eyes on the prize and hold on



Look what we've become

And the crosses we hang on

Keep your eyes on the prize and hold on

Hold on, yeah, hold on

Keep your eyes on the prize and hold on

Hold on, yeah, hold on

Keep your eyes on the prize and hold on
